Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw a string telephone that shows two students communicating over a distance.
The student can include features in the drawing that demonstrate using sound to communicate (e.g., drawing sound waves).
The student can show that the string telephone connects the two students.
The student can illustrate the use of everyday materials in the drawing to build the device (e.g., cups and string).
The student can represent how the device solves the problem of communication over a distance using sound.
